mapper.select: SELECT user_code, user_id, grade_code, area_city_code, user_pw, user_email, user_address, user_detail_address, user_phone, user_name, user_birth_date, user_gender, user_sign_date, user_update_date, user_delete_date, user_dormant_status, user_delete_status FROM `user` WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert:
/* 유저코드 자동증가 */ SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN CONCAT('uc', 1) ELSE CONCAT('uc', MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(user_code, 'uc', -1) AS UNSIGNED))+1) END AS userCode FROM user;
INSERT INTO user (user_code, user_id, grade_code, area_city_code, user_pw, user_email, user_address, user_detail_address, user_phone, user_name, user_birth_date, user_gender, user_sign_date, user_update_date, user_delete_date, user_dormant_status, user_delete_status) VALUES (#{userCode}, #{userId}, 'ugc2', #{userAddrSigungu}, #{userPw}, #{userEmail}, #{userRoadJibun}, #{userDetailAddress}, #{userPhone}, #{userName}, #{userBirthDate}, #{userGender}, NOW(), NOW(), null, 0, 0);
